name: The Insane
text:
[fast] During a skill test, discard the top card of the deck: You get +1 for that skill test (+3 instead if you discard a weakness or [[Dilemma]] card this way, then attach it to Mastermind?). (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +3. You may shuffle 1 basic weakness or [[Dilemma]] card in your discard pile, play area, threat area, or hand into your deck.
back_text: Deck Size: 35. Deckbuilding Options: Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-3, Cards that give you a weakness level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 3 non-permanent basic weaknesses, A Moment of Clarity, Mastermind?, 2 random basic weakness. Additional Deckbuilding Options: Up to X other cards level 0-2 with a trait you do not have more than 2 of in your deck (excluding traits on weaknesses), where X is the number of weaknesses in your deck or bonded cards. Additional Requirements: At the beginning of each scenario after the first, add 3 random [[Madness]] basic weaknesses to your deck. At the end of each scenario, choose 2 of these weaknesses to remove from your deck.

name: A Moment of Clarity
text:
The Insane deck only.
Fast.
For each weakness at your location, heal 1 damage and/or horror. Discard 1 weakness at your location and/or in your hand as if it were not a weakness.

name: Mastermind?
text: Permanent. Forced - At the start of your turn: Draw 1 card attached to Mastermind?. Then, you may take an additional action during your turn this round.

name: Basic Weakness Choice
text: Placeholder for a non-permanent basic weakness of your choice.
